name: VR Fast Car Race: Extreme EndLess Driving 3d game
name_original: VR Fast Car Race: Extreme EndLess Driving 3d game
description:
Check out this new VR Fast Car Race game. You drive your car in cockpit view through the endless traffic and realistic environment. Tilt your device to drag your car wherever you want, overtake traffic, earn scores and buy new cars & environments Play hard, drift your car,burn rubber on a full lineup and cruise through the VR race tracks. Burn up the streets with the fastest and most exhilarating VR cars.

Stunning high definition graphics with mind blowing game play giving you the adrenaline rush with every game.VR Fast Car Race brings you the most amazing top-speed dodge! Really Tour, Real cars,Real Competition real tracks, real traffic racing with epic drift stunts.

It's easy and fun to Play! You must run as fast as you can, avoid other cars and road transport verticals.

Game Features

- Easy to learn and drive.
- VR realistic cockpit view.
- Endless game mode.
- Simulator-like controls.
- Stunning 3D graphics.
- Smooth and realistic driving.
- 4 detailed environments: Beach, Desert, City,Bridge.
- Earn score rewards to unlock new cars & environments.

We'd appreciate to hear your suggestions and Reviews!
